text: Xinyang railway station () is a station on Beijing–Guangzhou railway and Nanjing–Xi'an railway in Shihe District, Xinyang, Henan. ==History== The station was established in 1902 and is the station with the longest operation history on Beijing–Hankou section of Beijing–Guangzhou railway. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Beijing–Guangzhou Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1902
title: Xinyang railway station
